title: #BitcoinVegan
author: #BitcoinVegan
content: Good morning, hope those who celebrate had a great holiday. I have a question, what wallet providers offer batch transactions and are there any mobile wallets that offer batch transactions.

comments.author: eternalgloom
comments.body: It's possible to do batch transactions with Electrum, it's a desktop wallet. In Electrum, it's not enabled by default, you have to go to 'Tools' >> 'Pay to many' and you'll have to option to add multiple addresses or load them from a CSV file. I have no idea which mobile wallets support this, if there are any.
